meanings.definition: Situated far from the center or main area.
meanings.sent1: The outlying villages had fewer people and smaller houses.
meanings.sent2: The outlying neighborhoods were quiet and peaceful.
meanings.sent3: The outlying picnic spot was so far that we almost got lost on the way back.
meanings.sent4: Her outlying thoughts wandered to distant lands and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The outlying mountains stood tall against the horizon, majestic and serene.

meanings.sent1: The outlying cabin in the woods was a perfect retreat from the city.
meanings.sent2: The outlying island was only accessible by boat.
meanings.sent3: The outlying gas station seemed like an oasis in the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her outlying dream of living off the grid finally came true.
meanings.sent5: The outlying lighthouse guided ships safely through the night, a beacon of hope.
